verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2317>Hadrach,<s%> and <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> shall be the <S%H4496>rest<s%> thereof: <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> as of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall be toward the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H1379>border<s%> thereby; <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> it be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2449>wise.<s%>

And <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> did <S%H1129>build<s%> herself a <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H4692>hold,<s%> and <S%H6651>heaped<s%> up <S%H3701>silver<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and fine <S%H2742>gold<s%> as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H136>LORD<s%> will <S%H3423>cast<s%> her out, and he will <S%H5221>smite<s%> her <S%H2428>power<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and she shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H3372>fear;<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> also shall see it, and be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2342>sorrowful,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron;<s%> for her <S%H4007>expectation<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> shall not be <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>
And a <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And I will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H8251>abominations<s%> from <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth:<s%> but he that <S%H7604>remains,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> he, shall be for our <S%H430>God,<s%> and he shall be as a <S%H441>governor<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> as a <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

And I will <S%H2583>encamp<s%> about my <S%H1004>house<s%> because of the <S%H4675>army,<s%> because of him that <S%H5674>passes<s%> by, and because of him that <S%H7725>returns:<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through them any <S%H5750>more:<s%> for <S%H6258>now<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> with my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H1523>Rejoice<s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> <S%H7321>shout,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to you: he is <S%H6662>just,<s%> and having <S%H3467>salvation;<s%> <S%H6041>lowly,<s%> and <S%H7392>riding<s%> on an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and on a <S%H5895>colt<s%> the <S%H1121>foal<s%> of an <S%H860>ass.<s%>

And I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> from <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H5483>horse<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off: and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> and his <S%H4915>dominion<s%> shall be from <S%H3220>sea<s%> even to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and from the <S%H5104>river<s%> even to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

As for you <S%H1571>also,<s%> by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H1285>covenant<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> forth your <S%H615>prisoners<s%> out of the <S%H953>pit<s%> wherein is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

<S%H7725>Turn<s%> you to the <S%H1225>strong<s%> <S%H1225>hold,<s%> you <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of <S%H8615>hope:<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> do I <S%H5046>declare<s%> that I will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> to you;

<S%H3588>When<s%> I have <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> for me, <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H5782>raised<s%> up your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> O <S%H3120>Greece,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> you as the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and his <S%H2671>arrow<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> as the <S%H1300>lightning:<s%> and the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and shall <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H5591>whirlwinds<s%> of the <S%H8486>south.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H1598>defend<s%> them; and they shall <S%H398>devour,<s%> and <S%H3533>subdue<s%> with <S%H7050>sling<s%> <S%H68>stones;<s%> and they shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and make a <S%H6963>noise<s%> as through <S%H3196>wine;<s%> and they shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> like <S%H4219>bowls,<s%> and as the <S%H2106>corners<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> them in that <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of his <S%H5971>people:<s%> for they shall be as the <S%H68>stones<s%> of a <S%H5145>crown,<s%> <S%H5264>lifted<s%> up as an <S%H5264>ensign<s%> on his <S%H127>land.<s%>

For <S%H4100>how<s%> great is his <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> and <S%H4100>how<s%> great is his <S%H3308>beauty!<s%> <S%H1715>corn<s%> shall make the <S%H970>young<s%> men <S%H5107>cheerful,<s%> and <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> the <S%H1330>maids.<s%>
